original_title: Tripod Tells the Tale of the Adventures of Tosswinkle the Pirate (Not Very Well)
overview: Join Scott, Yon and Gatesy as the attempt to tell a very simple story and fail miserably. Comic and Musical Geniuses the may be, but whoever let them near a theatre should have thought it through.
title: Tripod Tells the Tale of the Adventures of Tosswinkle the Pirate (Not Very Well)
